item.description:
Friday Nov 14th
We'll meet at the Prince Pizzeria @ 7:45
Shows start at 8:30pm

Tickets for this event are $27.50 per person
When you call to purchase tickets you MUST tell them you are adding onto AMY'S HAPPY HOUR reservation. When you arrive the night of the show, you must again tell them you are with Amy's Happy Hour group.
**BUY YOUR TICKET BEFORE RSVP'ING FOR THIS EVENT**

Comedians for the evening:
1) Lenny Clarke
During the early 1980s he spent a few years as regular host of the comedy open-mike nights at the now-defunct Ding-Ho Restaurant in Cambridge, Mass. He is now doing stand-up for high school functions in the Boston area, including Malden Catholic High School in Malden, Massachusetts. Attended University of Massachusetts Long-time stand-up comedian. Recently (2006) lost over 100 pounds on a diet.

2) Paul Gilligan

3) Johnny Pizzi
A comedian magician who is as clever as he is funny. With more than 20 years experience Johnny is a sure fire crowd pleaser. Johnny's humor is wild and exciting without being offensive or vulgar, because of this he can work a for a senior citizen home during the day and a hip comedy club at night. Everybody loves Johnny young and old alike. Even the toughest of customers can't help but bust out laughing while watching Johnny work his magic on the audience.

To purchase tickets:
Please Call 781-233-9950 For Tickets and Pricing
For additional information please check the website:
http://www.princerest...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll make a reservation under Amy's Happy Hour
item.name: Comedy Show in Saugus
